/category/create/:userId: create new category, posted by userId - isAdmin
/category/:categoryId/:userId (put): update category by categoryId, put by userId - isAdmin
/category/:categoryId/:userId (delete): delete category by categoryId, deleted by userId - isAdmin
/product/create/:userId: create new product, posted by userId - isAdmin
/product/:productId/:userId (delete): delete product by productId, deleted by userId - isAdmin
/product/:productId/:userId (put): update product by productId, put by userId - isAdmin
/products/related/:productId: get all related products based on current product's category
/products/by/search: get all products based on search condition
/user/:userId: get signle user based on userId
